name: Kathleen Regan - I Wrote this Today

metadata.description:
I am experimenting with not overthinking.
I want to go back to putting out music without thinking about why,
Or to who, and to how many. 
I don’t ever want to stand in my own way.

I am beyond grateful to have jumped into the music nft space in 2021 alongside friends (HI, Songcamp!) to learn, experiment, and experience the beginning stages of what this is and all it can be. I am, to be honest with everyone reading this, still shaking off some web2 trauma. I’m a fully independent singer/songwriter living in a city of artists and I’ve been here for 7 years… so I’m still learning how to act without having to plan so much... the content strategies, make the Tik Toks, delivering 4-6 weeks ahead, getting the spotify meetings, just to wake and hope they remembered you enough the next day. Enough… What a thought! I'm passionate about onboarding artists to web3 so we can all learn more about what that word can mean for us, and about our value as creatives.

(more backstory): 
On January 3rd 2022, an Instagram post from an artist named Chelsea Cutler went viral that caught my attention.. mainly because it spoke so accurately into what I was feeling, but also because of how fast I realized how many people felt the same way. 

The sentence that grabbed me most was “It feels like there is such a massive disconnect between listeners and artists that I haven't experienced before.”
It made me sad. Artists, who’s positions I imagined enjoying being in, sharing vulnerable and honest truth about how they don’t know how to navigate this industry in the form that it’s in today. I guess I sometimes feel like idols of mine have some magic wand, magic helper or something because they feel so far from where I am.. but then I started to grow up and get older in the industry, trying to understand it as best I could with my given experiences, and it kinda is one giant peek behind a curtain.. 

But then you have the choice!
The choices of where to spend your time, 
How you share your gift, who you want to collaborate with…
And. (I agree with Jimmy Iovine on this one), 
You go where your effort is. 


I knew I needed to get out these words yesterday (10/7) and I hope anyone who needs to hear it, will find it. 
Please be encouraged!!!! make your music!!! 
We will only fail when we stop.
KR

lyrics.text:
(V1)
MAYBE I
SHOULD TRUST MY MIND
FEED MY INTUITION
THERE'S NOTHING THAT I’M MISSIN’ OUT ON

OVER MY
OVER ANALYZING
EVERY LITTLE MOMENT
LIKE I SHOULD’VE KNOWN
WHAT I KNOW NOW 

(CHORUS)
BUT I'VE HEARD IT THROUGH THE GRAPEVINE
IT WONT PASS ME IF IT'S SUPPOSED TO BE MINE 
SO FOR ANYBODY LISTENING
FEELING LIKE YOU'RE RUNNIN’ OUT OF TIME 
YOU’RE NOT RUNNIN’ OUT OF TIME

YOU’RE NOT YET 
IT’S PROGRESS
WHAT IF THIS IS ALL
PART OF THE PROCESS

IT'S SO HARD WHEN WE DON'T KNOW WHY
BUT THERE'S SO MUCH ON THE WAY FOR YOU & I 

(V2)
CONSTANTLY 
FIGHTING ME
MAKIN’ PROBLEMS OUT OF NOTHING
CLOUDING ALL MY JUDGMENT 

WHY DO I MAKE BELIEVE
I'M NOBODY
EVEN WHEN I KEEP 
SHOWING UP AND WORKING HARD 
FOR ALL COMES TO ME

metadata.name: I Wrote this Today #1
metadata.title: I Wrote this Today
